Description.Text: Le Club Boutique Hotel is a charming 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Lecce. Highlights include a fine restaurant, lounge bar, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Lecce Cathedral. Lecce is a historical city in south Italy, boasting a history that dates back to pre-Roman Empire years. The city features many examples of Baroque architecture, but there are also remains of 13th-century and Roman-era buildings. Places of interest include the Roman Amphitheatre, the Church of the Holy Cross and the Museo Provinciale Sigismondo Castromediano. The hotel is housed in a historic mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Executive rooms are decorated in an elegant style with wood panelling and floors. Amenities include a work desk, mini-bar, safe, flat-screen TV and an en-suite bathroom. The onsite restaurant serves traditional and innovative Mediterranean cuisine, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the lounge bar. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
